tagline: Wyoming wilderness gravel. Where the mountains meet the high plains.

course.terrain_type: Big Horn Mountain foothills meeting high plains
course.terrain_surface: Variable gravel—maintained county roads to rougher forest service roads
course.signature_challenge: The wind. Wyoming wind is relentless and unpredictable. Headwind miles feel twice as long. The isolation amplifies everything.
course.character: Big sky, big views, big wind. Classic high-plains gravel with mountain backdrop.

suffering_zones.label: Wind Games Begin
suffering_zones.desc: Wyoming's famous wind starts testing your patience.

suffering_zones.label: Mountain Shadows
suffering_zones.desc: The Big Horns loom. You're not done yet.

course.climate_description: August brings warm days, cool mornings, and the ever-present Wyoming wind

biased_opinion.summary: Big Horn Gravel delivers what many big races have lost: genuine adventure in actual wilderness. No crowds, no chaos, just you and the Wyoming landscape. If you want to feel small against something vast, this is your race.

logistics.parking: Start area parking is generally manageable.

searchable_text: Big Horn Gravel Wyoming wilderness gravel. Where the mountains meet the high plains. Big sky, big views, big wind. Classic high-plains gravel with mountain backdrop. The wind. Wyoming wind is relentless and unpredictable. Headwind miles feel twice as long. The isolation amplifies everything.
